sys_script.name: SkillUP - Intern add manager

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_09a14a768383261053e9cb29feaad33e
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1805432_mock_ski_team</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SkillUP - Intern add manager</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	if (current.position == "intern"){
		var department = current.department;

		var teamMembers = new GlideRecord('x_1805432_mock_ski_team');
		teamMembers.addQuery('department', department); // Certifique-se que 'department' esteja definido
		teamMembers.query();

		if (teamMembers.getRowCount() > 0) {
			gs.info('Membros encontrados para o departamento: ' + department);
			while (teamMembers.next()) {
				gs.info('Membro da Equipe: ' + teamMembers.name + ' - ID: ' + teamMembers.sys_id);
			}
		} else {
			gs.info('Nenhum membro da equipe encontrado para o departamento: ' + department);
		}
	} 

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-02 22:47:30</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>09a14a768383261053e9cb29feaad33e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SkillUP - Intern add manager</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Mock SkillUp" source="x_1805432_mock_ski">4f410f888303625053e9cb29feaad323</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Mock SkillUp">4f410f888303625053e9cb29feaad323</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_09a14a768383261053e9cb29feaad33e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-02 23:07:09</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=09a14a768383261053e9cb29feaad33e"/></record_update>
